author: ch4r10t33r
content: Hello all,  My understanding is that light client support on EL clients was discontinued after Ethereum migrated to PoS. Where can I find more information about the plans for re-introducing light client support in EL nodes? I am researching to make it easier for ERC4337 bundlers nodes to work with light clients for custom tracing. Can anyone in this group please point me towards links on light client support in EL?

author: bridge-bot
content: <etan_status> EIP-6404 and so on (#typed-transactions) will allow using merkle proof for transaction, receipt and withdrawal structure fields. For state, there is already eth_getProof, but verkle will modernize this.
